app_0: m_c has reached the age of six moons and has been made an apprentice.
app_1: m_c has reached the age of six moons and has been made an apprentice, with (mentor) as their mentor.
app_2: Newly-made apprentice, m_c, touches noses with their new mentor, (mentor).
app_3: m_c carefully touches noses with their new mentor, (mentor), looking quite intimidated and nervous.
app_4: m_c excitedly touches noses with their new mentor, (mentor), looking quite eager to start training.
app_5: m_c strides up to their new mentor, looking very proud and excited to be apprenticed to (mentor).
app_6: In their eagerness, m_c accidentally shoves their nose into (mentor)'s so hard that (mentor) flinches back in surprise. m_c sheepishly apologizes, and the two have a good laugh about it.
app_7: (mentor) sees how nervous m_c is and whispers a quiet encouragement to them as they touch noses, promising to be a good mentor to them.
app_8: m_c touches noses with (mentor), wondering whether this is truly the right path for them.
app_9: m_c remains calm as they touch noses with (mentor), but their twitching tail gives away how excited they truly are.
app_10: m_c can't seem to sit still as they bounce up to touch noses with (mentor), swearing they'll be the best warrior the Clan has ever seen.
app_11: m_c sits up straighter as they're called forward to be made an apprentice. While they try to look calm and collected, they still tremble a bit as they touch noses with (mentor).
app_12: Almost immediately after m_c touches noses with (mentor), they start asking about when they're going to go out and explore the territory.
app_13: m_c fidgets impatiently beside (mentor) as they wait for the meeting to end. They're finally an apprentice! They want to hurry up, get out there, and go, go, go!
app_14: Newly-made apprentice, m_c wishes they had someone to mentor them.
app_15: m_c isn't confident in their ability to train themself, but will try anyway.
app_16: m_c is frustrated that they don't have a mentor.
app_17: m_c isn't sure what to do without the guidance of a mentor.
app_18: m_c wonders if they can get by without the guidance of a mentor.
app_19: m_c is so, so very excited to finally have a mentor, solidifying them as part of the Clan. They're grateful to be here, really... but (mentor) can't replace the parent who gave them to this Clan, the parent who should've been here chanting their name.
app_20: As m_c touches noses with (mentor), they hope that they'll be a cool mentor that won't assign boring tasks. Anything but gathering moss or tick duty!
app_30: (prefix)kit sits in front of the Clan with pride, their tiny heart beating so fast they think it might explode! They very excitedly touch noses with (mentor), happy to start their apprenticeship.
app_31: Surprising (mentor), the first thing that m_c asks to do once the meeting ends is gather moss so everyone has fresh bedding.
app_32: m_c touches noses with (mentor) and hopes that they'll get to hunt first, so they can make sure the Clan is fed.
app_33: Eager to learn the best ways to help their Clan thrive, m_c excitedly touches noses with (mentor).
app_34: m_c purrs so hard that they're shaking as they touch noses with (mentor).
app_35: m_c silently swears to StarClan to do their best for the Clan as they touch noses with (mentor).
app_36: As m_c touches noses with (mentor), they hope they'll get to do something that will really impress the Clan on their first day. Maybe they could catch a big, fat rabbit? Or chase off a fox! That'll show the Clan they're the best apprentice anyone's ever seen!
app_37: m_c sits excitedly beside (mentor) as the meeting ends, and hopes they'll be doing something exciting like battle training first. Their claws are itching to tear at something.
app_38: m_c touches noses with their mentor, (mentor), looking bored and unimpressed. But on the inside, they're bouncing around with euphoria as if they were still a kit!
app_39: m_c has been pestering everyone for moons on when they finally get to be an apprentice, and everyone is relieved that they're finally free of the young cat's nagging... Until they start asking about when they're going to be a warrior as soon as the meeting ends.
app_40: As their mentor is about to be chosen, m_c interrupts and announces they want their mentor to be (mentor). They stride forward with confidence to touch noses with (mentor) when it's allowed.
app_41: m_c can't believe their apprenticeship is finally here! Nearly tripping over their own paws, they scurry up to (mentor), excitedly touching noses with them.
app_42: Newly apprenticed m_c can't help but squeak when their mentor's name is announced, and they run with their tail tucked between their legs in embarrassment to touch noses with (mentor).
app_43: The Clan gathers around and urges (prefix)kit to go to the front of the crowd. Not having a leader isn't an excuse to force a cat to stay in the nursery when they're six moons old. (prefix)kit is renamed m_c, and the Clan votes to make (mentor) their mentor.
app_44: The Clan cheers for the new apprentice, m_c. They allow them to choose their own mentor, and m_c chooses (mentor).
app_45: With m_c's apprentice ceremony completed, there's still the problem of figuring out who will mentor them. (mentor) steps forward and offers to mentor them first, and m_c touches noses with them.
app_46: p1 is watching with pride as m_c is named and given to (mentor) to apprentice under. They know that (mentor) was a good choice.
app_47: (prefix)kit loudly complains as p1 pulls them over to quickly groom their pelt. They manage to wriggle away and scurry off to the front of the crowd for their ceremony, where they are renamed to m_c and apprenticed to (mentor).
app_48: Even though they are excited to finally be made an apprentice, it takes a bit of coaxing by p1 for (prefix)kit to step forward for their ceremony. p1 watches in pride as they're named m_c, and touch noses with (mentor).
app_49: m_c hopes that dead_par1 is watching in pride from StarClan as they are apprenticed to (mentor).
app_50: m_c wishes that they could be happier about being made an apprentice as they touch noses with (mentor), but all they can think about is how much they wish that dead_par1 was still there to chant their name with the rest of the Clan.
app_51: m_c tries to keep up a brave face as they're apprenticed to (mentor), but they keep stealing glances at the crowd, as if trying to find dead_par1 despite knowing they're no longer with them.
app_52: m_c sits beside their new mentor, (mentor) as the meeting comes to a close. Their claws dig into the ground as they glare up at the sky, wondering why dead_par1 couldn't be there with them at such an important moment.
app_53: m_c smiles up at the stars as they sit beside (mentor). The stars seem to shine brighter, and m_c knows it's a sign that dead_par1 is still watching over them.
app_54: As m_c touches noses with their new mentor, (mentor), they make a silent promise to dead_par1 to make them proud, and to take care of the Clan in their parent's absence.
app_55: (prefix)kit runs up to the front of the crowd, eager to get their new name. When they're called m_c for the first time, p1 and p2's voices can be heard the loudest as the Clan welcomes the new apprentice.
app_56: m_c hopes that dead_par1 and dead_par2 are watching in pride from StarClan as they are apprenticed to (mentor).
app_57: m_c wishes that they could be happier about being made an apprentice as they touch noses with (mentor), but all they can think about is how much they wish that dead_par1 and dead_par2 were still there to chant their name with the rest of the Clan.
app_58: m_c tries to keep up a brave face as they're apprenticed to (mentor), but they keep stealing glances at the crowd, as if trying to find dead_par1 and dead_par2 despite knowing they're no longer with them.
app_59: m_c sits beside their new mentor, (mentor) as the meeting comes to a close. Their claws dig into the ground as they glare up at the sky, wondering why dead_par1 and dead_par2 couldn't be there with them at such an important moment.
app_60: m_c smiles up at the stars as they sit beside (mentor). The stars seem to shine brighter, and m_c knows it's a sign that dead_par1 and dead_par2 are still watching over them.
app_61: As m_c touches noses with their new mentor, (mentor), they make a silent promise to dead_par1 and dead_par2 to make them proud, and to take care of the Clan in their parent's absence.
app_62: (mentor) calls a meeting. They have been watching (prefix)kit for a while now, and have decided to mentor them personally. m_c's eyes shine with pride.
med_app_0: (prefix)kit, like every young kit, had dreams of becoming a warrior from a young age. However, as they grew older, they knew that their destiny lay in the medicine den. They happily take up their new place as a medicine cat apprentice - looking forward to healing their Clanmates for many moons to come.
med_app_1: m_c has decided that hunting and fighting is not the way they can provide for their Clan. Instead, they have decided to serve their Clan by healing and communing with StarClan. (mentor) proudly becomes their mentor.
med_app_2: Interested in herbs even in their kithood, m_c is eager to be apprenticed to (mentor).
med_app_3: Interested in all the myths and stories told by the elders and queens, m_c decides to become a medicine cat apprentice, hoping to someday speak to those gone before. (mentor) loves their determination and eagerness to learn, and agrees to take them on as their apprentice.
med_app_4: The thought alone of fighting and hurting another cat makes m_c shiver. They decide to heal instead of fight, and (mentor) takes them under their wing.
med_app_5: Wanting to stand out among their Clanmates more, m_c decides to become a medicine cat, and is apprenticed to (mentor).
med_app_6: To gain access to both life-saving herbs and life-threatening poisons, m_c decides to become a medicine cat, and is apprenticed to (mentor).
med_app_7: Worried they may not be good as a hunter or fighter, but still wanting to make their Clan proud somehow, m_c decides to become a medicine cat apprentice under (mentor).
med_app_8: (mentor) stands before the Clan and announces that they will not be there forever, and it is time they took on an apprentice. They tell the Clan that they have chosen (prefix)kit, now m_c, to be their new apprentice.
med_app_9: (mentor) has no doubts in their mind of who their new apprentice will be. (prefix)kit has always been looking for an excuse to be in their den, asking endless questions about what each herb is and what it's used for. And as (mentor) announces that the newly named m_c, will be their apprentice, they see m_c's eyes shining in delight and excitement, and know they were right in choosing them.
med_app_10: Newly-made medicine cat apprentice m_c learns the way of healing through guidance from StarClan.
med_app_11: StarClan speaks, and has decided that the new medicine cat apprentice shall be m_c. m_c is unsure if they are ready for this role without a mentor, but the stars promise to guide them.
med_app_12: The Clan needs a new medicine cat, and m_c is chosen for the role. m_c is stunned that they were chosen, but agrees anyway, knowing how badly the Clan needs a medicine cat.
med_app_13: m_c has decided that hunting and fighting is not the way they can provide for their Clan. Instead, they have decided to serve their Clan by healing and communing with StarClan - who will be the ones to train them with the absence of a proper mentor.
med_app_14: Interested in herbs even in their kithood, m_c is eager to be made the new medicine cat apprentice, and learn how to heal from those who came before them.
med_app_15: The thought alone of fighting and hurting another cat makes m_c shiver. Knowing the Clan needs a medicine cat, they seize the chance to do good for the Clan without harming others, they take on the role of medicine cat apprentice.
med_app_16: Knowing the Clan is in desperate need of a medicine cat, and wanting to do something to stand out and do something more important, m_c announces mid-meeting that they want to be the new medicine cat apprentice.
med_app_17: m_c decides to become a medicine cat apprentice in hopes that they will be able to see dead_par1 in StarClan.
med_app_18: As the new medicine cat apprentice, m_c dreams of StarClan for the first time. They are greeted by many StarClan cats, one of which they recognize as dead_par1, who is watching in pride as the rest of StarClan's ranks accept the new medicine cat apprentice.
med_app_19: m_c decides to become a medicine cat apprentice in hopes that they will be able to see dead_par1 and dead_par2 in StarClan
med_app_20: As the new medicine cat apprentice, m_c dreams of StarClan for the first time. They are greeted by many StarClan cats, two of which they recognize as dead_par1 and dead_par2, who are watching in pride as the rest of StarClan's ranks accept the new medicine cat apprentice.
mediator_app_0: m_c decides to serve their clan as a mediator. They are delighted to begin training.
mediator_app_1: m_c feels sick at the mere thought of fighting. They decide to train as a mediator, and (mentor) is named as their mentor.
mediator_app_2: m_c is fascinated by (mentor)'s ability to solve disputes without tooth or claw. They are eager to learn, and (mentor) take them under their wing.
mediator_app_3: Now more than ever, m_c realizes the Clan is in need for a mediator, and decides to step up under StarClan's guidance.
mediator_app_4: Impressed by their eagerness, (mentor) chooses m_c as the Clan's new mediator apprentice.
mediator_app_5: m_c has taken to following (mentor) around during their daily duties, fascinated by the life of a mediator. (mentor) is happy to train them.
mediator_app_6: m_c has always been interested in helping their Clan but was never good with herbs or fighting: They found their calling as a mediator apprentice under (mentor), where m_c can serve with their words.
mediator_app_7: Despite the odd choice, m_c is firm that they'll be (mentor)'s apprentice: they want to help the Clan through words and influence, not through claw or fang.
mediator_app_8: Being a mediator apprentice was all that m_c was good at; with (mentor)'s guidance, m_c hopes they can change the Clan.
mediator_app_9: m_c had been waiting for this moment: they'll finally be a mediator apprentice and be guided by (mentor) on how to solve the Clan's issues, their one goal in life.
mediator_app_10: m_c always wanted to help their Clanmates but couldn't heal or fight for the Clan: they chose to become a mediator apprentice, hoping that (mentor) could teach them how to resolve the Clan's issues.
mediator_app_11: (prefix)kit can't contain the energy flowing through them: they were officially going to begin training to be a Mediator! They earn their apprentices name, m_c, and are guided by (mentor) on their journey.
mediator_app_12: (prefix)kit stands alert when called: they know what they want in life, and that is to be a mediator apprentice. They are named m_c and given to (mentor) so that they may complete that goal.
mediator_app_13: Knowing that the Clan needed someone to mediate their problems, (prefix)kit decided to become a mediator apprentice. They earn their apprentice name, m_c, and is given (mentor) to mentor them.
mediator_app_14: (prefix)kit had taken to following (mentor) around while they did their tasks, asking questions and listening. It wasn't a surprise they chose to become a mediator apprentice under (mentor) after earning their apprentice name m_c.
mediator_app_15: (prefix)kit always dreamed of becoming a Mediator: Now that they're m_c, an apprentice being mentored by (mentor), it feels like a wish come true.
med_0: (prefix)paw is given their full name of m_c and welcomed as a full medicine cat.
med_1: As (prefix)paw is given their full name of m_c, and welcomed as the new medicine cat of the Clan, they look to the stars and hope that (deadmentor) will be there with the rest of StarClan in their dreams.
med_2: (prefix)paw still can't believe that their mentor is gone. They don't feel ready to heal the Clan, and so politely decline being given a name yet. However, as they visit StarClan that half moon, (deadmentor) appears to them in a dream. They assure (prefix)paw that they'll be alright without them, and that they are ready for their full name. Resting their muzzle on (prefix)paw's head, (deadmentor) names them m_c.
med_3: Whisperings on the wind tickle at (previous_mentor)'s ears as they gaze up to the stars, an echo rolling smoothly off their tongue. StarClan blesses m_c and welcomes them!
med_4: With the stars softly shining and lighting their pelts, (previous_mentor) gives (prefix)paw their full name of m_c. They both share the rest of the night with StarClan, celebrating their good fortune in having another medicine cat.
med_5: Inspired by (prefix)paw's boundless energy and courage, (previous_mentor) names them m_c, and welcomes them as a full medicine cat.
med_6: Having finally reached the end of their apprenticeship, newly named medicine cat, m_c, feels there's still so much to learn, and frets about whether or not they are ready. With twitching whiskers, (previous_mentor) assures them that StarClan will always be there to guide them.
med_7: (previous_mentor) still remembers when (prefix)paw was just a kit, batting around in the medicine den, and asking endless questions about everything under the sun. (previous_mentor) chuckles with fondness as m_c asks why their new name was chosen with shining eyes and twitching whiskers.
med_8: (prefix)paw is taken to speak with StarClan. They are given the name m_c and are now a full medicine cat of the Clan.
med_9: The time has come for (prefix)paw to be given their full medicine cat name. (prefix)paw requests that one of the other Clans' medicine cats name them. The eldest of the medicine cats steps forward and gives (prefix)paw the name m_c.
med_10: With their training complete, StarClan decides to allow (prefix)paw to choose their own name. They name themself m_c, and return to the Clan the next morning as a full medicine cat.
med_11: As much as the warrior apprentices teased, (prefix)paw knew the truth. There is so much to see and do as a full medicine cat, and m_c could hardly wait to get started, almost charging off before their ceremony ended.
med_12: Helping cats heal is what (prefix)paw does best, their full name of m_c proves to them that they're fully qualified to do so, and that StarClan has accepted them for it.
med_13: As they take their first steps into being a full medicine cat, (prefix)paw quietly reflects that they might just have the most powerful position in the Clan, now that they're m_c. StarClan itself has accepted them, speaks through them, and m_c will remember this.
med_14: StarClan gives them wisdom, their Clan gives them strength, (prefix)paw will use this power to heal their warriors well after battle. They are now m_c, and swear to never turn away from what needs doing.
med_15: (prefix)paw may have butted heads against nearly every Clan member they have, but being able to argue was a blessing in a medicine cat, as m_c will have to continue shoving odd mixtures down everyone's throat. StarClan will be watching them with pride.
med_16: (prefix)paw has proven themselves to have one of the most invaluable traits a medicine cat can have - a level head under pressure. The stars of Silverpelt twinkle in joy and acceptance as m_c recives their full name and duties as a medicine cat.
med_17: It is (prefix)paw's attention to detail that earns them their medicine cat name of m_c. They will serve the Clan long and well, with no one doubting their skill and knowledge of herbs they've spent so many moons learning.
med_18: (prefix)paw's charming attitude does as much for their patients as their skill does. They will continue to heal with words and herbs as m_c now that they are a full medicine cat of c_n.
med_19: Though their actions may come off as lighthearted, (prefix)paw has worked hard to earn their name of m_c, and mews that they'll protect c_n as a medicine cat. Though they start giggling right after they say it, causing a few purrs of amusement from onlookers both here, and in StarClan.
med_20: No one knows what (prefix)paw is thinking as they receive their medicine cat name of m_c, only that their eyes are focused, clear, and as immovable as ice. No one doubts that they will be well suited to the heartbreaks that wait for all medicine cats.
med_21: Excellent medicine cats have as much heart as they do brains, and (prefix)paw proves they have both by the time they earn their name of m_c, proving a gentle touch does as much good as the right herbs.
med_22: (prefix)paw is so sure of their skill as medicine cat that they ask to choose their own name. While it may not be tradition, no one can think of a better fitting name for them then the one they chose themselves, and welcome m_c warmly as a full medicine cat.
med_23: (prefix)paw's methods are a little unconventional, but it's hard to argue with results, and (prefix)paw gets results. They gain their medicine cat name of m_c, and the eldest medicine cat of the Clan warns them not to do anything too risky.
med_24: There's so much pain that c_n has to endure, and (prefix)paw has decided to heal it all, no matter the cost. StarClan has accepted their passion, and supports them with the name of m_c, hoping that they can help ease some of the burden m_c placed on themselves.
med_25: (prefix)paw has known that StarClan has been watching over them since they started their apprenticeship. They are given the name m_c in honor of their faith. Tonight of all nights, as they feel starspeckled pelts weaving around them and whispering their new name, they know that StarClan will guide their pawsteps as a full medicine cat.
med_26: During their apprenticeship (prefix)paw struggled with the best way to protect c_n, with teeth or with tinctures, but now they're m_c they're certain they've made the right choice to be a medicine cat. Though they will keep practicing that battle move they've learned, just in case.
med_27: As the end of their apprenticeship nears, (prefix)paw is worried StarClan won't accept them as a full medicine cat. However, the ceremony plays out without a hitch, and m_c is honored as a skilled medicine cat.
med_28: While the rest of the Clan may not understand it (prefix)paw enjoys their time alone in the medicine den. In fact, now they're m_c, they can't wait to get back to it, and away from the center of attention.
med_29: Healing a sprain, comforting a bruised kit, soothing a sore elder - all of these things give (prefix)paw meaning in their life as a medicine cat. StarClan honors their caring heart with the name m_c.
med_30: c_n has raised and cared for (prefix)paw, and (prefix)paw wants nothing more but to do the same, taking on the name m_c as a full medicine cat of c_n. They will be thinking of how to care for c_n until the day they depart for StarClan, and maybe even past then as well.
med_31: (prefix)paw know all the herbs, they know how to treat rat bites, but surely they need to learn more? StarClan assures them that they'll do fine, and gives them the name m_c as a sign of trust, even if m_c is sure it's still too soon.
med_32: It is (prefix)paw's willingness to sit and listen that assures the other medicine cats it's time to give them their name of m_c. m_c thanks them graciously and tucks themselves back down to listen to the next cat speak.
med_33: No one knows how (prefix)paw got their claws on it, but they manage to play with a shiny piece of Twoleg something the whole time the other medicine cats give them their name - m_c. When asked why, m_c replied that one of their patients might like it, and they wanted to make sure it was safe before bringing it back home.
med_34: (prefix)paw always owns up to their mistakes, and puts the work in to fix them, but they are still surpised when they get their medicine cat name of m_c. They promise to work twice as hard to be worthy of it.
med_35: (prefix)paw says a silent prayer to StarClan as they get their medicine cat name of m_c. StarClan protect them, StarClan protect all of them, they hope they'll receive more guidance in the moons ahead.
med_36: (prefix)paw blurts out their new medicine cat name of m_c, cutting off the words of the ceremony mid-meow, not surprising anyone. There's no arguing with m_c, so the other medicine cats cheer for them, through purrs of amusement.
med_37: (prefix)paw's eyes glint as they get the medicine cat name of m_c. No one seems to notice that they don't agree to all of the vows of being a medicine cat, instead only nodding at some, and agreeing to others with a meow.
med_38: No one knows why (prefix)paw brought a mossball to their medicine cat naming ceremony. StarClan grants them their name of m_c all the same, welcoming them into the full mysteries of StarClan.
med_39: The way (prefix)paw is sitting is so stiff you could use them as reinforcement of the camp walls. Even when they get their medicine cat name of m_c, they don't loosen up, and only seem to sit up even more.
med_40: Even though this is their medicine cat naming ceremony, (prefix)paw can only think about their Clanmates back at camp, and asks if they can return early after they get their name of m_c.
med_41: StarClan honors the way (prefix)paw always goes the extra step to do their best as a medicine cat, and gives them the name of m_c, knowing that m_c will continue to do their best.
med_42: This is a serious time for (prefix)paw, their medicine cat naming ceremony! Naturally, they're cracking jokes and being irreverent right up until the moment they get their name of m_c, and quiet down long enough to think of something funny to add.
med_43: The other medicine cats mistake it as being calm, but (prefix)paw isn't quiet because they're at peace, but because they are angry. Every snide remark, every time someone sneered at them, every time they were treated less than, all of it goes through their mind. Now that they are m_c, c_n better treat them with respect, or there would be consequences.
med_44: Medicine cat training had just felt right for (prefix)paw, more like remembering then learning, like they had done this before. When it comes time for their naming, they ask to name themselves, and chose m_c for their name. It feels right for them to be called m_c.
med_45: (prefix)paw almost sobs as they spot dead_par1 stepping out of the crowd of StarClan cats towards them to congratulate them on completing their training. dead_par1 rests their muzzle on (prefix)paw's head, naming them m_c, and welcoming them as a full medicine cat.
med_46: As a StarClan cat steps forward to give (prefix)paw their new name of m_c, they spot dead_par1 watching them proudly from among the StarClan cats.
med_47: (prefix)paw almost sobs as they spot dead_par1 and dead_par2 step out of the crowd towards them to congratulate them on completing their training. dead_par1 rests their muzzle on (prefix)paw's head, naming them m_c, and welcoming them as a full medicine cat.
med_48: (prefix)paw almost sobs as they spot dead_par1 and dead_par2 step out of the starry crowd to congratulate them on completing their training. dead_par2 rests their muzzle on (prefix)paw's head, naming them m_c, and welcoming them as a full medicine cat.
med_50: As a StarClan cat steps forward to give, (prefix)paw their new name of m_c, they spot dead_par1 and dead_par2 watching them proudly with the other StarClan cats.
warrior_0: c_n welcomes m_c as a new warrior, honoring their r_h.
warrior_1: l_n calls the Clan to a meeting and declares (prefix)paw to be a warrior. They are now called m_c and are celebrated for their r_h.
warrior_2: l_n stands above the Clan and proclaims that (prefix)paw shall now be known as m_c, honoring their r_h.
warrior_3: l_n rests their muzzle on m_c's head and declares them to be a full warrior of c_n, honoring their r_h.
warrior_4: l_n has been following the progress of (prefix)paw for moons, and feels that it is finally time for them to get their warrior name. They are granted the name m_c in honor of their r_h.
warrior_5: (prefix)paw stands before the leader. They should be happier, but as they're given their warrior name, m_c in honor of their r_h, they cast a look to the crowd. They wish that (deadmentor) could be there to see them now.
warrior_6: (previous_mentor) sits in the crowd, chest puffed out in pride as they watch (prefix)paw be named m_c, and honored for their r_h. They consider themself lucky to have been able to train such an amazing young cat, and look forward to seeing the warrior they become.
warrior_7: (previous_mentor) gives (prefix)paw a friendly nudge when the leader calls the young cat's name. They watch with pride as (prefix)paw steps forward to receive their new name, m_c, and are honored for their r_h.
warrior_8: (prefix)paw sits in front of the Clan, eager to receive their name, but their focus seems somewhere else, somewhere beyond the horizon. They barely seem to be paying attention as they're named m_c after their r_h.
warrior_9: l_n gazes down proudly upon (prefix)paw. They had spent their whole apprenticeship helping the Clan, and so they are named m_c after their r_h.
warrior_10: (prefix)paw's eyes gleam as they stare up at l_n, vowing silently to themself to one day be the one up there. They are named m_c after their r_h.
warrior_11: Although (prefix)paw's eagerness to fight has left l_n a little worried before, they know that the Clan can count on (prefix)paw's bravery and sharp claws when they need them the most. In honor of their r_h, (prefix)paw is given the name m_c.
warrior_12: (prefix)paw stands tall and puffs out their chest as l_n announces they are ready for their warrior name. They are given the name m_c after their r_h.
warrior_13: (prefix)paw sits before the Clan, ears pricked forward and gaze calm as l_n addresses the Clan. They bow their head as they are named m_c after their r_h.
warrior_14: (prefix)paw sits neatly in l_n as they talk about how well (prefix)paw did in their assessment. They are named m_c after their r_h.
warrior_15: (prefix)paw holds their head high as l_n announces it is time for them to be given their warrior name. They are named m_c in honor of their r_h, and the Clan explodes into loud cheers for them.
warrior_16: (prefix)paw barely seems to be paying attention, attention focused on a fluttering leaf. l_n has to repeat their name a few times before they finally pay attention long enough to give their vow. Sighing, the leader names them m_c after their r_h.
warrior_17: While l_n is not quite sure that (prefix)paw has outgrown their childish quirks and their love of pranks, they welcome them as a full warrior to the Clan and naming them m_c after their lightheartedness and r_h.
warrior_18: (prefix)paw remains completely quiet as l_n names them m_c after their r_h. Before anyone can congratulate them, however, turns and walks away without a word to do their silent vigil.
warrior_19: (prefix)paw stares at l_n as they speak. l_n is sure it doesn't mean anything, but (prefix)paw's lack of enthusiasm worries them. Brushing past it, l_n gives them the name m_c after their r_h.
warrior_20: (prefix)paw was so busy helping another cat they were nearly late for their own warrior ceremony. They rush to sit down, and l_n gazes proudly down at them as they name them m_c after their r_h.
warrior_21: l_n has an unspoken fondness for (prefix)paw, but can't help but to feel that they are too soft for a life as a warrior. Nevertheless, they name them m_c after their r_h.
warrior_22: (prefix)paw soaks up all of the attention as they stand before their Clan, eager for their new name. l_n gives them the name m_c after their r_h.
warrior_23: (prefix)paw looks up at the leader with pride. They knew all that hard work - proving they were the best apprentice in the Clan - was worth it, even if it caused them a lot of trouble. They hold their head high as they're named m_c after their r_h.
warrior_24: (prefix)paw sits with a determined look on their face before the Clan, after many long moons of training. l_n is worried that their refusal to back down and jump headfirst into danger will end poorly for them, and hopes that sitting vigil overnight will change that. (prefix)paw is named m_c after their r_h.
warrior_25: (prefix)paw purrs as they feel the joy and pride of their Clanmates wash over them. l_n looks down upon them, eyes glowing with pride as well as they name them m_c after their r_h.
warrior_26: (prefix)paw's eyes glimmer while l_n talks about their accomplishments. Their gaze isn't focused on the leader, however, but the stars shining behind them. As they are given the name m_c, they wonder if StarClan honors their r_h, too.
warrior_27: As l_n gives (prefix)paw the name m_c, they swear that they see some starry cats yowling their support amongst their other Clanmates.
warrior_28: (prefix)paw sits in front of the leader, tail twitching back and forth as they await their warrior name. They're eager for this ceremony to be done, so they can go back out there and make sure the Clan is safe. Finally, l_n looks down upon them and names them m_c after their r_h.
warrior_29: Their training is done already? (prefix)paw isn't entirely sure if they're quite as ready to be a warrior as the leader claims them to be. Their voice trembles when they take their vow. As they're renamed to m_c, in honor of their r_h, they can't help but wonder if that is truly something that describes them.
warrior_30: (prefix)paw, now m_c, named so for their r_h, can only awkwardly thank their Clanmates as they weave through the crowd of purring cats. Once the meeting comes to a close, they slink out of camp to be alone for a while.
warrior_31: (prefix)paw looks around at their Clanmates with adoration while l_n announces that their new name will be m_c after their r_h. m_c is happy to be a warrior now, but mostly they just like to celebrate with their Clan, whether it's for them or not.
warrior_32: (prefix)paw looks around at their Clanmates with adoration while l_n announces that their new name will be m_c after their r_h. m_c is happy to be a warrior now, but mostly they just like to celebrate with their Clan, whether it's for them or not.
warrior_33: (prefix)paw fidgets nervously as they step forward in front of the Clan. This is an important moment, so they try not to hide their face from everyone as l_n gives them the name m_c in honor of their r_h They quickly scurry back into the crowd once the ceremony is done, silently hoping that will be the last ceremony they ever have.
warrior_34: As (prefix)paw nervously approaches their leader, l_n can't help but feel uncomfortable that they probably are going to be the reason of their demise someday by making them a warrior, steeling themselves they name them m_c in honor of their r_h and courage in the face of fear.
warrior_35: (prefix)paw sits unbothered as l_n rattles on through the long, formal words of the warrior ceremony. They give (prefix)paw the name m_c, honoring their r_h. m_c has no complaints about the long vigil they must do that night.
warrior_36: (prefix)paw bounces up to the front of the Clan, full of excitement. They try to at least take this somewhat seriously, but they still crack a joke over something the leader says. l_n gently scolds them for it, but can't help purring along as they name them m_c after their r_h.
warrior_37: (prefix)paw has shown more maturity than most cats their age, always offering to take on the worst apprentice jobs first, and counting the prey in the pile to know just how much to catch on patrol. l_n was tempted to make them a warrior sooner, but now will have to do. They name them m_c after their r_h.
warrior_38: (prefix)paw stands tall before the Clan, gaze determined as l_n says they are ready for their warrior name. (prefix)paw takes the vow seriously, and promises to always do what is best for everyone. Gaze proud, l_n names them m_c after their r_h.
warrior_39: (prefix)paw is still messy after tussling with someone else, and doesn't even bother to groom themself before trotting up to the front of the crowd. They are named m_c, and honored for their r_h.
warrior_40: (prefix)paw pads forward silently as they sit in front of their leader. They remain as quiet as their steps as l_n names them m_c in honor of their r_h.
warrior_41: (prefix)paw is nearly late for their ceremony, having been double checking something for reasons no one knows. l_n remains patient as (prefix)paw sits down in front of them. l_n names them m_c, honoring their r_h.
warrior_42: (prefix)paw grumbles to themself as l_n changes just a single word in the ceremony, but knows better than to correct them during such an important ceremony. They can speak to l_n about it later. For now, they listen as they are given the name m_c, and are honored for their r_h.
warrior_43: l_n hops up onto the meeting spot to find that (prefix)paw has set moss along it in preparation for the meeting so that l_n can be more comfortable through the long ceremony. Purring, l_n gives them the name m_c for their r_h.
warrior_44: l_n almost feels intimidated by the knowledge (prefix)paw has gathered in their months of training and feels confident when they name them m_c in honor of their r_h.
warrior_45: (prefix)paw's penchant for getting into, and even starting, trouble has almost made l_n hold back on making them a warrior. However, l_n can tell that (prefix)paw has been trying really hard lately, to make up for it, and it would feel cruel to make them wait any longer. So, l_n names them m_c in honor of their r_h.
warrior_46: As (prefix)paw takes their vow and is named m_c after their r_h, their thoughts are less on protecting the Clan, and more so on ensuring that anyone who harms it will pay in kind.
warrior_47: (prefix)paw's advice has helped many cats throughout their days as an apprentice. Even l_n has sought them out at times. l_n has no doubts in their mind that (prefix)paw is ready to be a warrior, and names them m_c, honoring their their r_h.
warrior_48: c_n rallies around (prefix)paw in celebration. Even without a leader, life must go on, and (prefix)paw has proven they are ready for their warrior name. (prefix)paw is allowed to choose their own suffix, and they name themself m_c. The Clan cheers for the new warrior, honoring their r_h.
warrior_49: (prefix)paw sits with their Clan, purring as they're congratulated on finishing their training. When given the option to choose their name, however, (prefix)paw can't really think of a suffix, and asks their Clanmates for some suggestions. After hearing a few ideas, (prefix)paw decides to be named m_c. The Clan cheers their new name, and honors them for their r_h.
warrior_50: Leader or no leader, c_n needs more warriors, and (prefix)paw has been working incredibly hard lately. The Clan agrees that they should be made a warrior. As they are named m_c, honoring their r_h, m_c wishes that (deadmentor) could be there to see them.
warrior_51: They don't care if there's no leader, the Clan knows that (prefix)paw is deserving of their full name. They gather to hold a ceremony for (prefix)paw, and name them m_c, honoring their r_h. m_c is proud of themself, though apart of them still wishes that (deadmentor) was still there to see them.
warrior_52: Leader or no leader, c_n needs more warriors, and (prefix)paw has been working incredibly hard lately. The Clan agrees that they should be made a warrior. They gather around the apprentice, and (mentor) is nudged forward to do the honor of giving them their name. Purring in pride for their apprentice, (mentor) rests their muzzle on (prefix)paw's head, and names them m_c, honoring their r_h.
warrior_53: They don't care if there's no leader, (mentor) knows that (prefix)paw is deserving of their full name. They gather the Clan themself to hold a ceremony for (prefix)paw, and name them m_c, honoring their r_h.
warrior_54: p1 can hardly believe how quickly time has passed since (prefix)paw was a kit. It still feels like just yesterday that they were tumbling around the nursery, chasing after a mossball or some other cat's tail. Misty-eyed with pride and joy, p1 throws their head back and tries to cheer the loudest as (prefix)paw is named m_c and honored for their r_h.
warrior_55: As the Clan cheers for the new warrior, m_c, p1 purrs loudly. Their kit is finally a warrior! A new journey has begun for m_c, and p1 knows that m_c's r_h will lead them through anything.
warrior_56: p1 and p2's eyes meet, and they purr with pride as (prefix)paw steps forward to receive their new name, m_c, and are honored for their r_h.
warrior_57: Are dead_par1 and dead_par2 watching from StarClan? (prefix)paw wonders this as they step in front of the Clan. They hope so. They truly do. As they are given the name m_c in honor of their r_h, m_c hopes that their parents are there, cheering with their Clanmates in the stars for their kit.
warrior_58: (prefix)paw tries to keep their head high as they step forward, and are given the name m_c in honor of their r_h. It doesn't seem fair. dead_par1 and dead_par2 should be here with them! They promised they would! m_c looks to the stars, and their anger and frustration vanishes. It feels as though the stars are brighter, and they know that, even if they cannot be there in body, their parents are there in spirit.
warrior_59: (previous_mentor) gathers the Clan for a meeting. They have spent many moons training (prefix)paw, and it's time for them to be granted their warrior name. (previous_mentor) gives them the name m_c and honors their r_h.
mediator_0: (prefix)paw has proven themselves skilled at handling the Clan's disputes. They are given the name m_c, and the Clan honors their new mediator.
mediator_1: m_c is welcomed as fully trained mediator of the Clan.
mediator_2: Although some Clan members have doubts of (prefix)paw's abilities, l_n gives them the name m_c and welcomes them as the Clan's new mediator.
elder_0: m_c wished to join the elders. The Clan honors them and all the service m_c has given to them.
elder_1: l_n proudly calls a Clan meeting to honor m_c's service to the Clan. It is time they retire peacefully to the elder's den.
elder_2: m_c wishes to join the elders. l_n calls a meeting, and the Clan honors them and all the service m_c has given to them.
elder_3: m_c's been resistant to retiring, but the aches and pains of old age have worn them down. They approach l_n, and are honored for their tireless service.
elder_4: m_c has been looking forward to their moons of rest as an elder. They happily retire, quickly settling into the elder's den.
elder_5: Time has taken its toll, and m_c has noticed themselves slowing down. They have worked timelessly for many moons, but is it time for them to retire.
